author: sauliusgrigaitis
content:
Maybe somebody faced the same issue - geth (the latest master) for some reason doesn't bind on authenticated rpc port. I'm running geth with:
`./geth--datadir /disk/go-ethereum/ --port 30333 --http.port 8560 --http --http.api="engine,eth,web3,net,debug,admin" --ws.port 8561 --ws --ws.api="engine,eth,web3,net,debug" --http.corsdomain "*" --networkid=1 --syncmode=full --authrpc.jwtsecret=/tmp/jwtsecret --authrpc.port=8562 --authrpc.vhosts="*"  --bootnodes "enode://be1127ae8f9522047fa92eeebf2d4922e1be94336ddd678b4829e512331af9463dcd24c2ff92423ef5cb5f654692a66bfd03a97ebca9e3124da14ca401d9e0f6@164.92.128.236:30303,enode://18ceab489f1e641ff2e6beff3c9229ec40bededd306ad88dcd29ff3deed6e37dff518e69093210cb44d6a84984e1793b258529b16fa7d3c595a71bba47f2f494@159.65.127.106:30303,enode://e8ae69887b04640dd0183e72e0fb4e34a453090ef1db8120c9e480509ad7b77d1623d7eb324bb06512a79f2d1d13ba2cf9248deab0070c257d89b7431aad82ee@159.223.29.90:30303,enode://2822e2111179da200e84896aa477295f2fb29a3c85109b839ed0f8b4b4ac56744feb52f397663fe64cf6ae9f2d339a5189c69a9af84664e567ae4e8d11b3a82a@164.92.162.6:30303" console`

author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: OK, so seems `master` doesn't work for some reason, but Pari gave me `7163e6d4` version and it binds authenticated endpoint correctly.
